title: 201-1001 Nights: In the Wind
itunes:title: 201-1001 Nights: In the Wind
description:
We're back in the stories of 1001 nights, where Scheherazade has to tell bedtime stories to save her life. On the first, a man ruins a wedding reception and can't show his face in town again. The second starts with a murder, and then only gets darker.

This week's item, the ridiculous umbrella hat: https://myths.link/umbrella

--

Sponsors:

BetterHelp: get 10 percent off your first month at http://BetterHelp.com/myths

Bombas: Give a pair when you buy a pair, and get 20 percent off your first purchase at http://bombas.com/legends

Athletic Greens: Check it out! You’ll receive up to a year’s supply of Liquid Vitamin D for FREE with your first purchase. Go to http://athleticgreens.com/legends

Indeed: try Indeed out with a free 75 dollar credit at Indeed.com/legends

--

Music:

“Sunset Stroll into the Wood” by Podington Bear

“Retrograde” by Podington Bear

“Two Boys and a Girl” by Podington Bear

"Wavy Glass" by Podington Bear

"Linen" by Podington Bear

“Minor Islands” by Podington Bear

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
